title: Flight Simulator 2020 - How to - Little Navmap - Adding SID's and STARS
description:
In this how to we are going to look at how we can use Little Navmap to find Standard Instrumental Departures (SID's) and STARS (Standard Terminal Approach Routers) which are part of MSFS 2020 and can be use during departure and arrival. We will look at how to find them and how to select the correct one for your flight.

Little Navmap can be downloaded from this site: https://www.littlenavmap.org/

The aircraft performance files referred to in the video can be downloaded from this site:
https://www.littlenavmap.org/downloads/Aircraft%20Performance/MSFS/
